summary: Water quality is stable but temperature is slightly below the 30-day average, which may affect fish and plant growth.

insights.recommendation: Maintain current pH levels; ideal range for tilapia is 6.5-8.5.
Continue monitoring; TDS levels are within acceptable range for both fish and plants.
Consider increasing water temperature to around 28-30°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.045 / 7.021 / 7.08 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 309.267 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.313 / 26.0 / 30.06 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
